<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_kmf.ScopedRevokeCertificate</api_name> <caller_access>2</caller_access> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>ScopedRevokeCertificate</name> <script><![CDATA[var ScopedRevokeCertificate = Class.create(); ScopedRevokeCertificate.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
revokeCertificateById: function(sysId, reason, endpoint) { var result = new sn_kmf_ns.KMFInstancePKI().revokeFromEndpoint(sysId, reason, endpoint); return result; },
type: 'ScopedRevokeCertificate' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-06 21:25:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7b3f2de6c13c251092251813c3f7aceb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ScopedRevokeCertificate</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework" source="sn_kmf">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b3f2de6c13c251092251813c3f7aceb</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-02-28 16:07:03</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
